message: I got Phil Collin's "Against all Odds" in my brain some time last night and it has been stuck for a day - is that weird?  Seriously - check out his 1985 Live Aid performance - it's pretty good - and his mullet is rocking too http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-OiV_5kEt6A
i still love the postal service cover
@jacob ya - it's a pretty decent cover and done in a very Postal Service style rather than trying to recreate the original
